Package model

Class Ai

java.lang.Object
model.GamePlayers
model.Ai
public class Ai extends GamePlayers
AI class used to represent the opponent of the game, which in this case is the computer itself. This is the class AI that inherits from GamePlayer.
Author:
kelvin.likollari@usi.ch and ilker.kaymak@usi.ch
